name: Thrshold
description:
Apply simple Threshold Effect Filter on images. Convert images to alpha masks.


________


1. How does it work ?


• select one (or many) shape with an image fill

• use slider or input to set threshold value

• click on "Apply"


Options :


- Transparent makes the white parts.. transparent

- Alpha masks creates image masks based on lightness


________


2. What is it ?


Thresholding replace each pixel in an image with a black pixel, if the image intensity is less than the threshold value, or a white pixel otherwise.
